title: Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/19
itunes:title: Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/2/19
description:
George Noory and author Cliff Pickover explore his research into artificial intelligence, and how it can be used in computers and medicine, and if there is a threat of AI growing beyond human control.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
